#r_token.title: Refresh token
#r_token.description: Google API refresh token, best obtained at Google's OAuth2 Playground

client_id.title: Client ID
client_id.description: Google API client ID, you got that from Developer console

bucket_name.title: Bucket name
bucket_name.description: Name of the Google Storage bucket

max_results.title: Max results
max_results.description: Number of objects loaded at once (10 - 1000, default 500). May influence performance, don't know what the best setting could be

#client_secret.title: Client secret
#client_secret.description: Google API client secret, you got that from Developer console

accepted_dirnames.title: Accepted directories
accepted_dirnames.description: Directories to download, possible values: subscribers, retained_installers, buyers_7d, subscriptions, gcm, ratings, crashes, installs, reviews, sales, earnings
